item.title: ‘It Ends With Us’ Insurer Files Lawsuit, Says It Doesn’t Have to Pay Justin Baldoni’s Legal Fees
item.description: The sprawling legal battle features deep pockets on both sides, with the billionaire founder of Paylocity backing Baldoni and Reynolds backing Blake Lively.

item.title: Blake Lively Wins Ruling That Her Deposition in Justin Baldoni Case Will Be Held on Her Turf
